description: This file defines the AWSSESTool class, a utility for sending emails via AWS SES, including methods for initialization and sending emails with error handling and logging.

classes.name: AWSSESTool
classes.description: A utility class for sending emails through AWS SES, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AWSSESTool with optional sender email and name, and sets up the boto3 SES client.

methods.name: send_email
methods.description: Sends an email using AWS SES with specified subject, body, and receiver email, including error handling and logging.
